tool.name: Monocle3 learnGraph
tool.description: between cells in dimensionality reduced space

param.name: no_partition
param.label: When this option is set, learn a single tree structure for all the partitions. If not set, use the partitions calculated when clustering and identify disjoint graphs in each.

param.name: no_close_loop
param.label: When this option is set, skip the additional run of loop closing after computing the principal graphs to identify potential loop structure in the data space.

param.name: euclidean_distance_ratio
param.label: The maximal ratio between the euclidean distance of two tip nodes in the spanning tree inferred from SimplePPT algorithm and that of the maximum distance between any connecting points on the spanning tree allowed to be connected during the loop closure procedure.

param.name: geodesic_distance_ratio
param.label: The minimal ratio between the geodestic distance of two tip nodes in the spanning tree inferred from SimplePPT algorithm and that of the length of the diameter path on the spanning tree allowed to be connected during the loop closure procedure. (Both euclidean_distance_ratio and geodestic_distance_ratio need to be satisfied to introduce the edge for loop closure.)

param.name: no_prune_graph
param.label: When this option is set, perform an additional run of graph pruning to remove smaller insignificant branches.

param.name: minimal_branch_len
param.label: The minimal length of the diameter path for a branch to be preserved during graph pruning procedure.

param.name: orthogonal_proj_tip
param.label: When this option is set, perform orthogonal projection for cells corresponding to the tip principal points.
